summary: After treating his rancher cousin shoddily in L.A. Michael Woods is sentenced by his parents to spending a month on the ranch with his cousin and aunt.
cast: Joey Lawrence|Andrew Lawrence|Susan Walters|M.C. Gainey|Leann Hunley|Robin Thomas|Jolie Jenkins|Steve Reevis|Freda Foh Shen|Ian Ogilvy|Nancy Renee|Channing Chase|Dan Martin|Holmes Osborne|Vicki Davis|Tom Virtue|Ben Livingston|Sam Horrigan|Craig Albrecht|Matthew Lawrence
title: Granjero de ciudad
